text.name: pih_ingameMenuProductionInfo
text.text: Production quantities per month (Active production lines only)

text.name: pih_ingameMenuProductionInfoHour
text.text: Production quantities per hour (Active production lines only)

text.name: pih_ingameMenuProductionInfoYear
text.text: Production quantities per year (Active production lines only)

text.name: pih_tooltip_showFullAnimals
text.text: Display of full animal stalls in the list

text.name: pih_tooltip_maxLines
text.text: Max number of lines of productsion to show.

text.name: pih_tooltip_maxSellingLines
text.text: Maximum lines of outlets. If there are more, an info line is added.

text.name: pih_tooltip_minSellAmount
text.text: This amount must be at least in stock to be displayed.

text.name: pih_moh_infoTextDaysSetting
text.text: Day filter. Left click to decrease, right click to increase

text.name: pih_moh_infoTextCapacitySetting
text.text: Capacity filter. Left click to decrease, right click to increase

text.name: pih_moh_leftClickToOpenRightClickForFilterProduction
text.text: Left-click to open production or right-click to filter by production

text.name: pih_moh_rightClickForFilterProduction
text.text: Right click to filter by production

text.name: pih_moh_rightClickForFilterFillType
text.text: Right click to filter by Filltype

text.name: pih_moh_rightClickForSwitchTimeAndFreeSpace
text.text: Right click to switch between remaining time and free space

text.name: pih_moh_help_text
text.text: Left click on Production Name or Filltype to filter the list. Press again to remove the filter\nRight click on the production name to open the production menu\nLeft click on the remaining time to toggle between the remaining time and the free available capacity.
